title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Skills: Exploring Mathematical Concepts Through Short-Term Maker Activities

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can visualize mathematical principles using four or more digital/analog tools.
Learners can connect mathematical patterns discovered through maker activities to three or more real-life applications.
Learners can explain the mathematical logic of their creations with over 80% accuracy based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
